content: I had hoped that the move to Zulip would make it easier to fix problems with Dragonbot and in some ways it has. However, user names are handled differently in Zulip, which has caused some new problems with Karma.

I actually had the thought the other day that isn't it nice we're not as karma-obsessed as we were in Gitter. Maybe because of the issues with it, but I don't mind that there's a lot less karma-slinging going on :blush:

@BWPanda ++
:laughing:
bwpanda Props to you for all your hard work. (Karma: 4)
